name: Dennis: Behind the Scenes
description:
Play as Dennis as you film scenes for a new upcoming movie about exploring the depths of space, or shoot outs in the old west, or defeating demonic creatures to save a kingdom, whatever that stuff doesn't matter, we'll add all that all in post. For now, get infront of that green screen and act your heart out!

This is my first attempt at doing a game jam solo, so please excuse the art :).

Music used from here: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

Use WASD to move, mouse to aim, and left click to shoot.

Enjoy!
